thread.title: EC fixes Mar 30 for voting in Comilla City polls, Sunamganj-2 by-election
thread.title_full: EC fixes Mar 30 for voting in Comilla City polls, Sunamganj-2 by-election

title: EC fixes Mar 30 for voting in Comilla City polls, Sunamganj-2 by-election
text:
EC fixes Mar 30 for voting in Comilla City polls, Sunamganj-2 by-election Senior   Published: 2017-02-20 14:47:23.0 BdST Updated: 2017-02-20 14:48:12.0 BdST Schedule for the Comilla City Corporation polls and by-election for the Sunamganj parliamentary seat fallen vacant after death of Awami League leader Suranjit Sengupta have been announced. 
The newly formed Election Commission led by KM Nurul Huda has fixed Mar 30 for the voting. 
Chief Election Commissioner Huda told a media briefing on Monday that the deadline to file nominations for the elections is Mar 2. 
Officials will scrutinise nominations submitted for the Sunamganj -2 bypolls on Mar 5 while the last day to withdraw from the race is Mar 13. 
For the Comilla city polls, nominations will be scrutinised on Mar 5 and 6 while the deadline for aspirants to pull out ends on Mar 14, said the CEC. 
More to follow
